channel.title: Comments on: Now and Zen: travels in Japan

item.title: By: opole
item.dc:creator: opole
item.description: The bambbo trees are wonderful and the Japanese architectural masterpieces are just attractive, the wooden corridor is out of this world, one needs to travel Japan by the way
item.content:encoded: The bambbo trees are wonderful and the Japanese architectural masterpieces are just attractive, the wooden corridor is out of this world, one needs to travel Japan by the way

item.title: By: Therie
item.dc:creator: Therie
item.description: Ahh ~ I'm almost too jealous of your Japan travels. I've been enchanted by Japan for so long, though I haven't set foot on its soil yet. I know it'll be one beautiful and unforgettable experience to walk among the shrines and temples of Kyoto or stroll down the quirky streets of Tokyo. Thank you for sharing your experience, it was a worthwhile read and your photos are so lovely!
item.content:encoded: Ahh ~ I’m almost too jealous of your Japan travels. I’ve been enchanted by Japan for so long, though I haven’t set foot on its soil yet. I know it’ll be one beautiful and unforgettable experience to walk among the shrines and temples of Kyoto or stroll down the quirky streets of Tokyo. Thank you for sharing your experience, it was a worthwhile read and your photos are so lovely!

item.title: By: Inge
item.dc:creator: Inge
item.description: I love the photographs - I have to go! Everybody can do with a bit of inner peace, don't you think?
item.content:encoded: I love the photographs – I have to go! Everybody can do with a bit of inner peace, don’t you think?
